metadata.synopsis: Five druids participate in a ritual around a sacred pool. The chant will summon a coccoon of thorns that will encircle their entire grove. Lines play sequentially, each druid saying one line, then the next, etc.They're chanting at a normal to low volume. They're attempting to suss power out from the earth itself, but they're not forcing it out. There should be a loose rhythm to it (think Arwen from LoTR when she summons the river horses), but it shouldn't come across like a drum circle.

0.speaker: Aelar, Karrik, Inwe, Tahan, Elwyn
0.context: NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Ahb SPEE-ree-too oo-MOHK, AH-coo-lay-oos VEE-tees-kway.

1.speaker: Aelar, Karrik, Inwe, Tahan, Elwyn
1.text: Defende nos ab imminentibus aequilibrio tuo.
1.context: NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: deh-FEN-day nohs ahb ee-mee-NEN-tee-booce AI-kwee-lee-bree-oh TWO-oh.

2.speaker: Aelar, Karrik, Inwe, Tahan, Elwyn
2.context: NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Een OOM-brahm CRAY-toose, sahn-GWEE-neh ee-you-RAH-toose.

3.speaker: Aelar, Karrik, Inwe, Tahan, Elwyn
3.text: Complexum tuum, ab terra ortum, ad nos defer.
3.context: NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Com-PLECK-soom TOO-oom, ahb TEH-rah ohr-TOOM, ahd nohs dee-FEHR.

4.speaker: Aelar, Karrik, Inwe, Tahan, Elwyn
4.text: Hostes subeunt. Protege nos. Muni nos.
4.context: NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: HO-stess soo-BAY-uhnt. PRO-teh-jay nohs. MOO-nee nohs.

5.speaker: Aelar, Karrik, Inwe, Tahan, Elwyn
5.text: Aggeniculamur in umbra tua, Pater Arborum.
5.context: NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: AH-jeh-nee-koo-lah-moor een OOM-brah TWO-ah, PAH-tehr ARR-bore-oom.
